          <title>
            <string language="sl">Janko in Metka - domače branje</string>
            <string language="en">Hansel and Gretel - home reading</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hansel und Gretel - Hauptmesswert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hansel et Gretel - lecture à la maison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hansel e Gretel - leitura home</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hansel e Gretel - lettura domestica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hansel και Gretel - βασική ανάγνωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hansel y Gretel - lectura casera</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učni listi so namenjeni obravnavi Grimmove pravljice Janko in Metka - domače branje (po pogovoru, dramatizaciji, branju ..., sledi še samostojno delo). Učni listi spodbujajo k analizi pravljičnih likov, razmišljanju o vsebini ter razvijanju domišljije (ustvarjalno pisanje). Prispevek je smiselno uporabiti še s prispevkoma: Janko in Metka - priprava na ogled opere in Opera Janko in Metka - predstavitev.</string>
            <string language="en">Evaluation of reading comprehension of home reading - Hansel and Gretel by brothers Grimm.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">janko in metka</string>
            <string language="en">hansel and gretel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">domače branje</string>
            <string language="en">home reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pravljica</string>
            <string language="en">fairy tale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">brata grimm</string>
            <string language="en">brothers grimm</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswertung des Leseerfassens des Hauptmesswertes 
- Hansel und Gretel durch Brüder Grimm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évaluation de la compréhension de lecture de la
lecture à la maison - Hansel et Gretel par des frères Grimm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Avaliação da compreensão da leitura da leitura
home - Hansel e Gretel por irmãos Grimm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Valutazione di comprensione della lettura di 
lettura domestica - Hansel e Gretel dai fratelli Grimm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αξιολόγηση της κατανόησης ανάγνωσης της βασικής 
ανάγνωσης - Hansel και Gretel από τους αδελφούς Grimm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evaluación de la comprensión de la lectura de 
la lectura casera - Hansel y Gretel de los hermanos Grimm.</string>
          </description>
